data.Caption: Thank God I don’t have to hunt for my food, I don’t even know where tacos live.
My weaknesses have always been food and food — in that order.
I just want a guy to say the three magic words to me…I brought food.
I am not like others . I know what I want for dinner. I have been thinking about it since lunch.
Skinny people are easier to kidnap. Stay safe, eat cake.
Coffee should be black as hell, strong as death and sweet as love.
Coffee is always a good idea.
There’s no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.
Life is a combination of magic and pasta.
Cupcakes are muffins that believed in miracles.
Life is uncertain. Eat dessert first.
